Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Vivid Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Vivid Pro Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Vivid Pro Blood Glucose Test Strips
On Call Vivid Pro Glucose Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Vivid Pro Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for On Call Vivid Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical enzymatic assay
Indications for Use Summary: Used by healthcare professionals in health care facilities for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control programs; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or use on neonates
